title: Jon Baptiste Hears Green Day for the First Time
content:
In this video from Pianote, the multi-talented Jon Baptiste hears Green Dayâ€™s Holiday for the first time (drum & vocals only) and is challenged to come up with a piano accompaniment for it â€” and he really really gets into it. (How do you find a song that a musical encyclopedia like Baptiste has never heard before though?)

These are always so fun to watch â€” see also Drummer Plays Metallicaâ€™s Enter Sandman After Hearing It Only Once. Oh and Green Dayâ€™s demastering of Dookie. (via @unlikelywords.bsky.social)
